title: Showcase is Back!
description:
It’s been awhile, we know, but we’ve got some exciting Showcase updates for you. Keep an ear right here to catch a brand new series coming your way April 28.

Want audio recommendations and updates about your favorite Radiotopia shows? Sign up for the Citizen newsletter at radiotopia.fm/citizen.

itunes:subtitle: Some exciting updates from Radiotopia.
author: info@radiotopia.fm (Radiotopia)
